select count(id) from orders where riskManagemenType = #{riskManagemenType} and companyId = #{companyId} and orderCreateTime = #{orderCreateTime}

select sum(ord.realityBorrowMoney) from orderdetails ord,orders o where o.id = ord.orderId and o.companyId = #{companyId} and o.orderCreateTime = #{orderCreateTime}
select sum(ord.realityAccount) from orderdetails ord,orders o where o.id = ord.orderId and o.orderCreateTime = #{orderCreateTime} and o.companyId = #{companyId}
